title: Log Timestamp Extractor
description: Extract timestamps from server logs that follow the format: [YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS] where the year is 2020-2029, months are 01-12, days are 01-31, hours are 00-23, minutes and seconds are 00-59. The entire timestamp must be enclosed in square brackets.
solutionSummary: This complex pattern validates timestamp components with ranges. `202[0-9]` restricts years to 2020-2029, `(0[1-9]|1[0-2])` validates months 01-12, `(0[1-9]|[12][0-9]|3[01])` handles days 01-31, `([01][0-9]|2[0-3])` limits hours to 00-23, and `([0-5][0-9])` validates minutes/seconds 00-59. Square brackets are escaped as literal characters.
